title: Experiments and considerations touching colours first occasionally written, among some other essays to a friend, and now suffer'd to come abroad as the beginning of an experimental history of colours / by the Honourable Robert Boyle ...
author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
notes: "A short account of some observations made by Mr. Boyle about a diamond that shines in the dark" (p. 389-423) has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
